item.title: [cmr] Eternal Witness
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [cmr] Cultivate
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

item.title: [cmr] Rampant Growth
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

item.title: [cmr] Rampaging Baloths
item.description:
Creature — Beast

Trample

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.

item.title: [cmr] Molimo, Maro-Sorcerer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elemental

Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

Molimo, Maro-Sorcerer's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.

item.title: [cmr] Sporemound
item.description:
Creature — Fungus

Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

item.title: [cmr] Search for Tomorrow
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

Suspend 2—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

item.title: [cmr] Retreat to Kazandu
item.description:
Enchantment

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one —

• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

• You gain 2 life.

item.title: [cmr] Ramunap Excavator
item.description:
Creature — Naga Cleric

You may play lands from your graveyard.

item.title: [cmr] Verdant Sun's Avatar
item.description:
Creature — Dinosaur Avatar

Whenever Verdant Sun's Avatar or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

item.title: [cmr] Terastodon
item.description:
Creature — Elephant

When Terastodon enters the battlefield, you may destroy up to three target noncreature permanents. For each permanent put into a graveyard this way, its controller creates a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

item.title: [cmr] Yavimaya Elder
item.description:
Creature — Human Druid

When Yavimaya Elder dies, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

{2}, Sacrifice Yavimaya Elder: Draw a card.

item.title: [cmr] Wickerbough Elder
item.description:
Creature — Treefolk Shaman

Wickerbough Elder enters the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.

{G}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from Wickerbough Elder: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [cmr] Wyleth, Soul of Steel
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warrior

Trample

Whenever Wyleth, Soul of Steel attacks, draw a card for each Aura and Equipment attached to it.

item.title: [cmr] Aesi, Tyrant of Gyre Strait
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Serpent

You may play an additional land on each of your turns.

Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.

item.title: [cmr] Growth Spiral
item.description:
Instant

Draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

item.title: [cmr] Fathom Mage
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

Whenever a +1/+1 counter is put on Fathom Mage, you may draw a card.

item.title: [cmr] Deflecting Palm
item.description:
Instant

The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. If damage is prevented this way, Deflecting Palm deals that much damage to that source's controller.

item.title: [cmr] Simic Charm
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

• Permanents you control gain hexproof until end of turn.

• Return target creature to its owner's hand.

item.title: [cmr] Sharktocrab
item.description:
Creature — Shark Octopus Crab

{2}{G}{U}: Adapt 1. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Sharktocrab, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

item.title: [cmr] Response // Resurgence
item.description: Instant // Sorcery

item.title: [cmr] Murkfiend Liege
item.description:
Creature — Horror

Other green creatures you control get +1/+1.

Other blue creatures you control get +1/+1.

Untap all green and/or blue creatures you control during each other player's untap step.

item.title: [cmr] Master Warcraft
item.description:
Instant

Cast this spell only before attackers are declared.

You choose which creatures attack this turn.

You choose which creatures block this turn and how those creatures block.

item.title: [cmr] Wear // Tear
item.description: Instant // Instant

item.title: [cmr] Urban Evolution
item.description:
Sorcery

Draw three cards. You may play an additional land this turn.

item.title: [cmr] Tiana, Ship's Caretaker
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Angel Artificer

Flying, first strike

Whenever an Aura or Equipment you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may return that card to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [cmr] Spitting Image
item.description:
Sorcery

Create a token that's a copy of target creature.

Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

item.title: [cmr] Simic Sky Swallower
item.description:
Creature — Leviathan

Flying, trample

Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

item.title: [cmr] Bell Borca, Spectral Sergeant
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spirit Soldier

Note the converted mana cost of each card as it's put into exile.

Bell Borca, Spectral Sergeant's power is equal to the greatest number noted for it this turn.

At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

item.title: [cmr] Hamza, Guardian of Arashin
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elephant Warrior

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

item.title: [cmr] Captain Vargus Wrath
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Orc Pirate

Whenever Captain Vargus Wrath attacks, Pirates you control get +1/+1 until end of turn for each time you've cast a commander from the command zone this game.

item.title: [cmr] Jared Carthalion, True Heir
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warrior

When Jared Carthalion, True Heir enters the battlefield, target opponent becomes the monarch. You can't become the monarch this turn.

If damage would be dealt to Jared Carthalion while you're the monarch, prevents that damage and put that many +1/+1 counters on it.

item.title: [cmr] Obeka, Brute Chronologist
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Ogre Wizard

{T}: The player whose turn it is may end the turn. (Exile all spells and abilities from the stack. The player whose turn it is discards down to their maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/787632456

item.title: [cmr] Kwain, Itinerant Meddler
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Rabbit Wizard

{T}: Each player may draw a card, then each player who drew a card this way gains 1 life.

item.title: [cmr] Blighted Woodland
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{3}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Woodland: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

item.title: [cmr] Coral Atoll
item.description:
Land

Coral Atoll enters the battlefield tapped.

When Coral Atoll enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an untapped Island you control to its owner's hand.

{T}: Add {C}{U}.

item.title: [cmr] Boros Guildgate
item.description:
Land — Gate

Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

item.title: [cmr] Boros Garrison
item.description:
Land

Boros Garrison enters the battlefield tapped.

When Boros Garrison enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.

{T}: Add {R}{W}.

item.title: [cmr] Jungle Basin
item.description:
Land

Jungle Basin enters the battlefield tapped.

When Jungle Basin enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an untapped Forest you control to its owner's hand.

{T}: Add {C}{G}.

item.description:
Land

Forgotten Cave enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {R}.

Cycling {R} ({R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

Land

{T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Encroaching Wastes: Destroy target nonbasic land.

item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{4}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

item.title: [cmr] Memorial to War
item.description:
Land

Memorial to War enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {R}.

{4}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Memorial to War: Destroy target land.

item.title: [cmr] Memorial to Genius
item.description:
Land

Memorial to Genius enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {U}.

{4}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Memorial to Genius: Draw two cards.

item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{R}{W}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains vigilance and haste until end of turn.

item.description:
Land — Gate

Simic Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

item.description:
Land

Simic Growth Chamber enters the battlefield tapped.

When Simic Growth Chamber enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.

{T}: Add {G}{U}.

item.description:
Land

Secluded Steppe enters the battlefield tapped.

item.title: [cmr] Sunhome, Fortress of the Legion
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{2}{R}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.
